item.title: About the Team
item.description: We are a team of volunteers who organize the discussion and evaluations from Shaykh Faisal Al-Mahmudi on this webpage for educational purpose. About Shaykh (Mufti) Faisal Al-Mahmudi (ghufira lahu wa li walidayhi) Shaykh Mufti Faisal bin Abdul Hamid al Mahmudi was born in Pakistan. In his teenage years he travelled to Canada for higher education in Accounting and Finance. He did his Bachelors and Masters from University of Regina, Canada. Thereafter he chose to move to South Africa to pursue islamic studies in traditional seminary.
